articles.author: celtic
articles.description:
We left Edinburgh last week after the Hibs game on high after Irish international, Adam Idah smashed a late penalty home in the dying minutes. His celebrations in front of us  in the stand behind the goals summed up all our relief at securing all 3 points. Celtic were not at their best which has […]

articles.title: TIME TO CIRCLE THE WAGONS
